features: More light modes (low, medium, high, 1 second flashing)
Stronger battery lasts up to 24 hours
Press & hold power button for 3 seconds to shut off
2 straps: adjustable bottom strap/fixed top strap
4 modes: low, bright, super bright, 1 sec flashing
10.8 cm height, 12.7 cm diameter, 2.5 cm collapsed
No batteries needed - just the sun
